attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Tony Blair agreed to a massive IT project in the NHS in 2003 the original costs of £2.3 billion have rocketed to more than £10 billion.  This petition calls for the prime minister and his government to apologise to the UK tax payer for wasting their money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
